title: Welcome to FIFTH
excerpt: Welcome to the official FIFTH website! We're excited to share this new platform with you where you can find everything about our music, shows, and the latest updates.

title: Back in the Studio
excerpt: The past few weeks have been all about experimentation and pushing creative boundaries. We've been diving deep into new production techniques and sound design.

title: Upcoming Shows & Tour Dates
excerpt: The stage is calling, and we're ready to answer! After months of studio time, it's time to bring these tracks to life in front of a crowd.
